response.overview: This documentary delves into the horrific medical experiments carried out by Nazi doctors in concentration camps during World War II, focusing on the notorious Josef Mengele and the SS staff at Auschwitz, Dachau, and other camps across the Third Reich. It explores the brutal and inhumane procedures inflicted on prisoners, from genetic testing to torture under the guise of scientific research. Survivor testimonies and rare archival footage reveal the lasting trauma caused by these atrocities, highlighting the dark intersection of ideology and cruelty.
response.title: Shocking Experiments from WWII Germany
